t: Tips to stay safe and avoid scams when shopping at Amazon
s: If you receive a message about the purchase of a product or service, do not respond to the message or click on any link in the message; instead, log into your Amazon account or use the Amazon mobile app and confirm that it is really in your purchase history before taking any action.

s: December 28, 2023 - The majority of Amazon phishing scams are impersonation scams. These are when someone pretends to be an official representative of a company or a government agency or a trusted individual like a friend or a family member.

t: 10 Common Types of Amazon Scams To Avoid - Keeper
s: October 29, 2024 - All official Amazon purchases are done on the platform. However, some fraudulent sellers on Amazon will try to get users to pay them off the platform and use payment methods such as Zelle, Venmo or a wire transfer. t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million.
